## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have run `pnpm run lint` and `pnpm run format`
- [ ] I have run `pnpm run typecheck` with no errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions/classes
- [ ] I have updated API documentation if endpoints were modified

### Database
- [ ] I have created and tested database migrations if schema changed
- [ ] I have verified migrations are reversible

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR introduces breaking changes (describe in description)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have updated version numbers appropriately
